scripts.create: export NODE_ENV=local && sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.create:test: export NODE_ENV=test && sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.start:prod: export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start bin/start --name HEMA-STUDIO-PROD
scripts.create:prod: export NODE_ENV=production && sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.start:audit: export NODE_ENV=audit && pm2 start bin/start --name HEMA-STUDIO-AUDIT
scripts.create:audit: export NODE_ENV=audit && sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
scripts.start:dev: export NODE_ENV=dev && pm2 start bin/start --name HEMA-STUDIO-AUDIT
scripts.create:dev: export NODE_ENV=dev && sequelize db:create --charset utf8mb4 --collate utf8mb4_unicode_ci
